targetString: نتیجتاً، خطوط هوایی متعددی به دلیل کمبود تقاضا، پروازها را لغو کرده اند بشمول از British Airways‏، China Eastern Airlines و Qantas، در حالی که طیاره منطقوی انگلیس Flybe ورشکست شد.
en-mt: As a result, several airlines have cancelled flights due to lack of demand, including from British Airways, China Eastern Airlines and Qantas, while british regional plane Flybe went bankrupt.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: اثر آن روی صنعت کشتی های تفریحی به حدی بود که قبلاً هرگز دیده نشده بود.
en-mt: Its effect on the recreational ship industry was such that it had never been seen before.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: چندین ایستگاه قطار و بنادر کشتی نیز بسته شده اند.
en-mt: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: اپیدمی، با چونیان که فصل اصلی مسافرت که مربوط به رخصتی سال نو چینایی است مصادف شد.
en-mt: The epidemic coincided with Chunyan, the main travel season related to the Chinese New Year holiday.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: دولت های ملی و منطقوی، شماری از رویداد ها مانند جشن های سال نو را که با حضور افراد زیادی برگزار می شد لغو کردند و شرکت های خصوصی هم طرز مستقل فروشگاه ها و جاذبه های توریستی خود مانند دیزنی لند هانگ کانگ و دیزنی لند شانگهای را تعطیل کردند.
en-mt: National and regional governments canceled a number of events, such as New Year's Eve celebrations attended by many people, and private companies shut down independent stores and tourist attractions such as Disneyland Hong Kong and Disneyland Shanghai.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: بسیاری از رویدادهای سال نو قمری و جاذبه های گردشگری بسته شده اند تا از تجمع افراد جلوگیری شود، بشمول از شهر ممنوعه در Beijing و نمایشگاه های سنتی معابد.
en-mt: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent people from gathering, including from the Forbidden City in Beijeing and traditional temple exhibitions.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: در ۲۴ ولایت از ۳۱ ولایت چین، مقامات ولسوالی و منطقوی، رخصتی سال نو را تا ۱۰ فبروری تمدید کردند و به بیشتر محل های کار دستور دادند تا آن تاریخ باز نشوند.
en-mt: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, district and regional authorities extended the New Year's holiday until February 10 and ordered most workplaces not to open that date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: این مناطق نماینده ۸۰ فیصد تولیدات داخلی و ۹۰ فیصد محصولات صادراتی بودند.
en-mt: These regions represented 80% of domestic production and 90% of export products.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: هانگ کانگ سطح پاسخ به مرض انتانی خود را تا بلندترین میزان ارتقاء داد و وضع ایمرجنسی اعلان کرد، مکاتب را تا ماه مارچ بسته کرد و جشن های سال نو را لغو کرد. بخش خرده فروشی در کل دنیا تحت تأثیر قرار گرفته است و ساعات کاری آنها کم شده است یا رخصتی های موقت داشته اند.
en-mt: Hong Kong upgraded its response level to the highest level and announced an emergency situation, closed schools until March and cancelled New Year's eve celebrations. The retail sector has been affected worldwide and their working hours have been reduced or they have had temporary holidays.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: بازدید از خرده فروشی ها در اروپا و آمریکای لاتین تا ۴۰ فیصد کاهش پیدا کرده است.
en-mt: Retail visits in Europe and Latin America have dropped by 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: خُرده فروش های شرق میانه و آمریکای شمالی شاهد ۵۰ تا ۶۰ فیصد اُفت فروش بودند.
en-mt: Sales in the Middle East and North America saw 50 to 60% of sales.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: این موضوع همچنان به کاهش شدید میزان خرید در فروشگاه ها در ماه مارچ نسبت به فبروری منجر شد.
en-mt: This continued to lead to a sharp decline in the amount of purchases in stores in March compared to February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: گردانندگان مراکز بزرگ خرید دنیا اقدمات تکمیلی صورت دادند، مانند افزایش رعایت اصول صحی، نصب اسکنر گرمایی برای چک کردن دمای بدن خریداران و لغو کردن رویدادها. طبق تخمین کمیسیون اقتصاد سازمان ملل برای آمریکای لاتین، کساد ناشی از این پاندمی سبب فقر مطلق ۱۴ تا ۲۲ ملیون نفر در آمریکای لاتین می شود که بیش از شمار وضعیت بدون پاندمی است.
en-mt: The operators of the world's major shopping malls took additional steps, such as increasing compliance with health principles, installing a heat scanner to check buyers' body temperature and canceling events. According to the UN Economic Commission for Latin America, the pandemic's shortfall causes absolute poverty of 14 to 22 million people in Latin America, more than the number of pandemic-free situations.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: در جنوری و فبروری ۲۰۲۰ در مدت اوج پاندمی در ووهان، حدود ۵ ملیون نفر در چین شغل خود را از دست دادند.
en-mt: In January and February 2020, about 5 million people lost their jobs in China during the peak of the pandemic in Wuhan.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: شمار زیادی از تقریباً ۳۰۰ ملیون کارگر مهاجر روستایی چین، در ولایت های دور از دریا در خانه گیر کرده اند یا در ولایت هوبئی گیر افتاده اند. در مارچ ۲۰۲۰، بیش از ۱۰ ملیون آمریکایی وظیفه خود را از دست دادند و تقاضای کمک دولتی کردند.
en-mt: Many of China's almost 300 million rural migrant workers are stuck at home in remote sea provinces or stranded in Hubei province. In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: مطابق با تخمین های بانک فدرال ریزرو سنت لوئیز، شیوع کروناویروس می تواند تا ۴۷ ملیون شغل در ایالات متحده را تحت تأثیر قرار دهد و نرخ بیکاری را الی ٪۳۲ بلند ببرد. قرنطین مکمل در هند سبب بیکاری ده ملیون کارگر مهاجر هندی (که با اخذ اجوره کار می کنند) شده است. نتایج یک سروی انجام شده توسط انستیتو آنگوس رید نشان داد ٪۴۴ خانواده های کانادایی به نوعی درگیر بیکاری شدند. از وقتی که قرنطین مکمل در اواسط مارچ ۲۰۲۰ در اسپانیا اجرا شد، حدود ۹۰۰۰۰۰ کارگر کار خود را از دست دادند.
en-mt: According to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis, the coronavirus outbreak could affect up to 47 million jobs in the United States and lift the unemployment rate to 32%. Complementary quarantine in India has unemployment for 10 million Indian migrant workers (who work by obtaining a visa). The results of a survey conducted by the August Reid Institute showed that 44% of Canadian families were involved in unemployment. About 900,000 workers have lost their jobs since the supplement quarantine was implemented in Spain in mid-March 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: طی نیمه دوم ماه مارچ، ۴ ملیون کارگر فرانسوی تقاضای حقوق بیکاری موقت کردند و ۱ ملیون کارگر بریتانیوی تقاضای اعتبار همگانی (یونیورسال کردیت) کردند. تقریباً نیمی از یک ملیون شرکت در جرمنی طرح های کار کوتاه مدت کارگران با یارانه دولتی به نام کورزاربیت را اجرا کردند.
en-mt: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment rights and 1 million British workers applied for universal credit (Universal Kurdish). Almost half of a million companies in Germany implemented short-term labor plans for government-subsidized workers called Corzarbit.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: برنامه غرامت کار کوتاه مدت جرمنی، توسط فرانسه و بریتانیه نیز پذیرفته شده است.
en-mt: Germany's short-term work compensation program has also been accepted by France and britain.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: بخش های فعال در زمینه هنرهای نمایشی و میراث فرهنگی به شدت تحت تأثیر جنبه های منفی پاندمی قرار گرفتند که بر عملکردهای سازمان و افراد اعم از کارکنان و افراد مستقل در سراسر جهان تأثیرگذار بوده است.
en-mt: Active sectors in the field of performing arts and cultural heritage were heavily influenced by the negative aspects of the pandemic, which has affected the performance of the organization and individuals, including employees and independent individuals around the world.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: سازمان های بخش فرهنگی و هنری تلاش کردند تا از رسالت خود (غالباً با بودجه عمومی) حمایت کنند تا عموم بتوانند به میراث فرهنگی دسترسی پیدا کنند، امنیت کارمندان خود و مردم را حفظ کنند و در صورت امکان از هنرمندان حمایت کنند.
en-mt: Cultural and artistic sector organizations tried to support their mission (often publicly funded) so that the public could access cultural heritage, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists if possible.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: الی تاریخ مارچ ۲۰۲۰، در سراسر دنیا، با میزان متفاوت، موزیم ها، کتابخانه ها، محل های اجرا و دیگر نهاد های فرهنگی همراه با نمایشگاه ها، رویدادها و اجراهایشان که لغو شده بودند یا به تعویق افتاده بودند، برای مدت نامعین تعطیل شده بودند.
en-mt: By March 2020, around the world, museums, libraries, venues and other cultural institutions, along with exhibitions, events and performances that had been cancelled or postponed, had been closed for an indefinite period.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: در واکنش، تلاش های زیادی برای ارائه خدمات جایگزین ذریعه پلتفرم های دیجیتالی نیز انجام شده است. یکی دیگر از موارد اخیر و شتاب دهنده در کاهش مرض، لغو رویدادهای مذهبی، رویدادهای مهم ورزشی و سایر رویدادهای اجتماعی مانند جشنواره موسیقی و کنسرت ها، کنفرانس های تکنالوجی و نمایش های مُد است.
en-mt: In response, many efforts have been made to provide alternative services through digital platforms. Another recent and accelerating case in reducing disease is the cancellation of religious events, major sporting events and other social events such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: صنعت سینما نیز دچار اختلال شده است. واتیکان اعلان کرد که رسوم هفته مقدس در رُم، که باید هفته گذشته در چله روزه داری مسیحیان برپا می شده، نیز لغو شده است.
en-mt: The cinema industry has also been disrupted. The Vatican announced that the holy week customs in Rome, which should have been held last week in the fortieth of Christian fasting, had also been cancelled.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: بسیاری از اسقف ها به مسیحیان مسن توصیه کرده اند که به جای حضور در مراسم روزهای یکشنبه در خانه بمانند؛ برخی از کلیساها مراسم کلیسا را ذریعه رادیو، پخش آنلاین یا تلویزیون پخش کرده اند، در حالی که برخی دیگر عبادات فردی را توصیه می کنند.
en-mt: Many bishops have advised older Christians to stay at home instead of attending Sunday sermons; some churches have broadcast church ceremonies through radio, online broadcasting or television, while others recommend individual worship.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: با توجه به آنکه اسقف کلیسای کاتولیک رُم، کلیساهای بزرگ و کوچک خود را تعطیل کرده و میدان سنت پیتر از زائرین مسیحی خالی شده است، سایر نهادهای مذهبی نیز خدمات خود را لغو کرده و اجتماعات عمومی در کلیساها، مساجد، کنیسه ها، معابد و زیارتگاه ها را محدود کردند.
en-mt: As the bishop of the Rome Catholic Church shut down its churches large and small and St. Peter's Square was empty of Christian pilgrims, other religious institutions also cancelled their services and restricted public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and shrines.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: وزارت صحت ایران اعلان کرد به دلیل شیوع مرض برگزاری نماز جمعه در مناطق منتن لغو می گردد و اماکن مذهبی نیز در ادامه تعطیل شدند، در حالی که عربستان سعودی ضمن جلوگیری از ورود زائرین خارجی، زیارت مکان های مقدس در مکه و مدینه را برای شهروندان خود نیز ممنوع کرده است.
en-mt: Iran's Health Ministry announced that friday prayers would be cancelled in mentan areas due to the outbreak, and religious sites were also closed down, while Saudi Arabia has also banned pilgrimage to holy sites in Mecca and Medina for its citizens while preventing foreign pilgrims from entering.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: این پاندمی سبب مهمترین وقفه در برگزاری مسابقات ورزشی از زمان جنگ جهانی دوم به بعد شده است.
en-mt: This pandemic has caused the most important interruption in sports competitions since World War II.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: اکثر رویدادهای مهم ورزشی یا کنسل شده اند یا به تعویق افتاده است، بشمول از مسابقات لیگ قهرمانان اروپا یوفا 2019-2020، لیگ برتر 2019-2020، یوفا یورو ۲۰۲۰، فصل NBA و فصل NHL از سال ۲۰۱۹ تا ۲۰۲۰.
en-mt: Most major sporting events have either been cancelled or postponed, including from the UEFA Champions League 2019-2020, the 2019-2020 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, the NBA season and the NHL season from 2019 to 2020.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: این شیوع، برنامه های المپیک تابستانی ۲۰۲۰ را که از ابتدا قرار بود از اواخر ماه جولای آغاز شود، نیز مختل کرد؛ کمیته بین المللی المپیک در ۲۴ مارچ اعلان کرد که این رویداد "به تاریخ دیگری غیر از سال ۲۰۲۰ تبدیل خواهد کرد اما بعد از تابستان ۲۰۲۱ نخواهد بود". کازینوها و دیگر مکان های بازی در سراسر جهان بسته شده اند و مسابقات پوکر زنده یا به تعویق افتاد یا لغو شد.
en-mt: The outbreak also disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to begin in late July; the IOC announced on March 24 that it would "turn into a date other than 2020 but it will not be after the summer of 2021". Casinos and other gaming venues around the world have been closed and live poker competitions have either been postponed or cancelled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: این امر سبب شد که بسیاری از قماربازان به قمار آنلاین رو بیاورند و بسیاری از سایت های قمار آنلاین، افزایش قابل توجه میزان ورود به سایت خود را گزارش کردند. صنعت تفریحات و سرگرمی هم تحت تأثیر قرار گرفته اند و گروه های موزیک متعدد تور های کنسرت خود را تعلیق یا لغو کردند.
en-mt: This led many gamblers to turn to online gambling, and many online gambling sites reported a significant increase in logging. The entertainment industry has also been affected, and numerous music groups have suspended or cancelled their concert tours.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: بسیاری از سینماهای بزرگ بشمول از موارد موجود در برودوی همچنان همه سیانس های خود را تعلیق کردند.
en-mt: Many major cinemas, including those in Broadway, continued to suspend all their cinemas.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: برخی از هنرمندان راه هایی را برای ادامه تولید و شریک سازی کار ذریعه انترنت بحیث جایگزینی برای اجرای زنده سنتی مانند کنسرت های پخش مستقیم یا خلق "جشنواره های انترنیتی" مبتنی بر ویب برای هنرمندان غرض اجرا، توزیع و تبلیغ آثار خود مورد بررسی قرار داده اند.
en-mt: Some artists have explored ways to continue producing and sharing internet-based work as an alternative to traditional live performances such as direct broadcast concerts or creating web-based "internet festivals" for artists to perform, distribute and promote their works.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: ترول های انترنیتی آنلاین با موضوع کروناویروس برای حواس پرتی و شوخی در میان این بلاتکلیفی در حال پخش استند.
en-mt: Online internet trolls with the issue of coronavirus are being aired for distraction and jokes amid this uncertainty.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: از زمان شیوع کووید-۱۹، تعصب منفی، بیگانه هراسی و نژادپرستی شدیدی نسبت به مردم چین و اقوام آسیای شرقی و علیه مردم کشورهای اروپایی با نرخ شیوع بالا، ایالات متحده و دیگر کشورها مشاهده شده است.
en-mt: Since the COVID-19 outbreak, negative prejudice, xenophobia and extreme racism toward chinese people and East Asian ethnic groups and against people from European countries with high prevalence rates, the United States and other countries have been observed.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: حوادثی مانند ترس، شک و خشونت در بسیاری از کشورها به خصوص در اروپا، آسیای شرقی، آمریکای شمالی و منطقه آسیا اقیانوسیه مشاهده شده است.
en-mt: Incidents such as fear, doubt and violence have been observed in many countries, especially in Europe, East Asia, North America and the Asia Pacific region.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: گزارش ها از ماه فبروری (وقتی اکثر واقعات تاهنوز به چین محدود بودند) نشان از احساسات نژادپرستانه گروه های متعدد در کل دنیا می داد که مردم چین را سزاوار این ویروس و آنچه کیفر بحق ادعا می شد، می دانستند.
en-mt: Reports from February (when most incidents were still limited to China) showed the racist sentiments of numerous groups around the world that the Chinese people deserved the virus and what was rightly claimed.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: برخی کشور های آفریقا هم شاهد افزایش احساسات ضد چینایی بوده اند.
en-mt: Some African countries have also seen an increase in anti-Chinese sentiment.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: بسیاری از باشندگان ووهان و هوبئی گزارش دادند به واسطه این که اهل این منطقه استند، مورد تبعیض واقع شده اند.
en-mt: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei reported being discriminated against because they were from the area.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: کمک های آنلاین و غیرآنلاین از مناطق تحت تأثیر ویروس در چین وجود داشته است.
en-mt: There has been online and non-online assistance from areas affected by the virus in China.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: به دنبال پیشرفت شیوع مرض در کشورهای با نرخ شیوع بالای جدید، مردم ایتالیا، نخستین کشور در اروپا که گسترش جدی کووید-۱۹ را تجربه کردند، همچنان می توانند در معرض بدگمانی و بیگانه هراسی شهروندان سایر کشورها قرار بگیرند. شهروندان در کشورهایی بشمول از مالیزیا، نیوزلند، سینگاپور و کوریای جنوبی در ابتدا طومارهایی برای ممنوع کردن ورود اتباع چینایی به کشورشان در تلاشی برای توقف مرض امضا کردند.
en-mt: Following the progress of the outbreak in countries with new high prevalence rates, the Italian people, the first country in Europe to experience the serious spread of COVID-19, can still be exposed to the suspicion and xenophobia of citizens of other countries. Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea initially signed petitions to ban Chinese nationals from entering their country in an effort to stop the disease.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: در جاپان هشتگ #ChineseDontComeToJapan (چینایی ها به جاپان نیایید) در توییتر ترند شد.
en-mt: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan (Chinese don't come to Japan) became more and more twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: مردم چین و همچنان سایر مردم آسیایی در انگلستان و ایالات متحده از افزایش سطح توهین های نژاد پرستانه و همچنان حملات خبر داده اند.
en-mt: Chinese people, as well as other Asian people in the UK and us, have reported an increase in the level of racist insults as well as attacks.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: رئیس جمهور دونالد ترامپ برای نام بردن از کروناویروس تحت عنوان "ویروس چینایی" با انتقاد مواجه شده است، اصطلاحی که از دید منتقدین نشانه نژادپرستی و ضد چینایی بودن است.
en-mt: President Donald Trump has faced criticism for naming coronavirus as the "Chinese virus," a term that critics see as a sign of racism and anti-Chineseness.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: معترضین در اوکراین به اتوبوس های حاوی شهروندان اوکراینی و خارجی خارج شده از ووهان و انتقال یافته به نووی سنژاری حمله کردند.
en-mt: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses containing Ukrainian and foreign citizens leaving Wuhan and transported to Novi Senzhari.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: طبق گزارشات محصلینی از مناطق شمال شرق هندوستان که دارای مرز مشترک با چین است و محصلینی که در شهرهای بزرگ هند مشغول به تعلیم استند، بخاطر از شیوع کرونا ویروس مصاب ترس و اضطراب شده اند.
en-mt: Students from northeastern India, which shares a border with China and students studying in major Indian cities, have been feared and anxious about the coronavirus outbreak, according to reports.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: دیلیپ گوش، رئیس بخش دولتی حزب بهاراتیا جاناتا (Bharatiya Janata) در بنگال جنوبی اظهار کرد که چینایی ها طبیعت را نابود کردند و " برای همین است که خدا از آنها انتقام گرفت."
en-mt: Dilip Goosh, head of the government department of the Bharatiya Janata Party in South Bengal, stated that the Chinese destroyed nature and "that's why God took revenge on them."

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: این سخنان بعداً توسط کنسولگری چین در کلکته محکوم شده و "اشتباه" خوانده شدند. در چین، بیگانه هراسی و نژادپرستی بر علیه شهروندان غیرچینایی پس از پاندمی تشدید شده است و اتباع خارجی بحیث "آشغال های خارجی" قلمداد شدند یا گفته شد که باید به "سطل زباله" انداخته شوند.
en-mt: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata and called "wrong." In China, xenophobia and racism against non-Chinese citizens have intensified after the pandemic, with foreign nationals considered "foreign junkies" or said to be thrown into "trash."

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: بسیاری از روزنامه های دارای بخش های پولی، این قسمت ها را حذف کرده اند تا اخبار مربوط به کروناویروس را پوشش دهند.
en-mt: Many newspapers with monetary sections have removed these episodes to cover news about coronavirus.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: بسیاری از ناشران علمی، مقالات علمی مرتبط با شیوع ویروس را طرز رایگان در اختیار همگان قرار داده اند.
en-mt: Many scientific publishers have provided free scientific articles related to the virus outbreak.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: برخی دانشمندان تصمیم گرفتند نتایج خود را به سرعت در سرورهای پیش چاپ مانند bioRxiv شریک نمایند.
en-mt: Some scientists decided to quickly share their results on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: مرض واگیردار نوظهور: مرض واگیردار با قابلیت پتوجنی نوظهور، معمولاً جدید در دامنه شیوع و یا نوع انتقال
en-mt: Emerging communicable disease: Contagious disease with emerging blanket capability, usually new in the scope of prevalence or type of transmission

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: جهانی شدن و مرض - مروری بر جهانی شدن و انتقال مرض
en-mt: Globalization and Disease - A Review on Globalization and Disease Transmission

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: لست اپیدمی ها و پاندمی ها - لیست آمار فوت به دلیل مرض انتانی
en-mt: List of epidemics and pandemics - Death Statistics List due to Antani disease

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: قاچاق حیوانات وحشی و مرض مشترک بین انسان و حیوان، خطرات صحت مرتبط با تجارت حیوانات وحشی در حیات وحش غیر بومی آنها
en-mt: Trafficking of wild animals and common disease between humans and animals, health risks associated with the trade of wild animals in their non-native wildlife

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: تست لابراتواری برای مرض کروناویروس تنفسی ۲۰۱۹ (COVID-19) و ویروس SARS-CoV-2 مرتبط با آن، شامل دو نوع روش است، روش هایی که وجود ویروس را شناسایی می کنند و روش هایی که وجود انتی بادی ایجاد شده در پاسخ به حضور انتان را شناسایی می کنند.
en-mt: Laboratory testing for respiratory coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) and related SARS-CoV-2 virus includes two types of methods, methods that identify the presence of the virus and methods that identify the presence of antibodies created in response to the presence of antennas.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: وجود ویروس ها در نمونه های تأیید شده توسط RT-PCR، که RNA کروناویرس را شناسایی می کند.
en-mt: The presence of viruses in samples confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects Coronavirus RNA.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: این یک آزمایش خاص است و فقط برای شناسایی RNA ویروس SARS-CoV-2 طراحی شده است.
en-mt: This is a special test and is designed only to detect SARS-CoV-2 virus RNA.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: برای تأیید انتانات بسیار جدید یا فعال استفاده می شود.
en-mt: It is used to verify very new or active antennas.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: از شناسایی انتی بادی ها (سیرم شناسی) می توان هم برای تشخیص مرض و هم برای سرویلانس جمعیتی استفاده کرد.
en-mt: Identification of antibodies (cyrology) can be used both for diagnosis of disease and for population cervilans.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: آزمایش انتی بادی ها نشان می دهد چه شمار به مرض منتن بودند، بشمول از کسانی که علائمشان به قدری ضعیف بود که نیاز به گزارش آن نبود یا کدام علامت مرض نداشتند.
en-mt: Antibodies tests show how many were infected, including those with symptoms so weak that they did not need to report it or had no symptoms.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: رقم دقیق نرخ مرگ ومیر در اثر این مرض و سطح معافیت گله ای در جمعیت را می توان با استعمال نتایج این آزمایش مشخص کرد.
en-mt: The exact figure of mortality rate due to this disease and the level of herd exemption in the population can be determined by using the results of this experiment.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: به دلیل محدود بودن آزمایشات، الی مارچ ۲۰۲۰ کدام کشوری دیتای قابل اتکایی در پیوند با شیوع ویروس در میان مردم نداشت.
en-mt: Due to the limited tests, until March 2020, no country had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus among the people.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: تا ۲۳ مارچ، کدام کشوری بیش از ۳٪ جمعیت خود را آزمایش نکرده بود و در رابطه با شمار آزمایشات انجام شده در کشورهای مختلف جهان، تفاوت زیادی وجود دارد.
en-mt: By March 23, which country had not tested more than 3% of its population, and there is a huge difference in the number of tests conducted in different countries around the world.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: تبدیل پذیری هم احتمالاً به طرز قابل ملاحظه ای بالای واقعات فوت گزارش شده، که احتمال می رود در بعضی کشورها به شکل قابل توجهی بیش از حد خوشبینانه تخمین شده باشند، اثرگذار باشد.
en-mt: Conversion is also likely to be significantly high in reported death events, which are likely to be significantly over-optimistic in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: به کمک واکنش زنجیره یی پولیمراز ترانسکرپشن معکوس آنی (rRT-PCR)، می توان تست را روی نمونه های تنفسی که به روش های مختلف به دست می آیند، بشمول از نمونه انفی بلعومی یا نمونه بلغم انجام داد.
en-mt: The test can be performed on respiratory samples obtained by different methods, including phlorum sniffi samples, using instantaneous reverse transcretion polymraze (rRT-PCR) chain reaction.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: نتایج معمولاً پس از چند ساعت یا حداکثر تا ۲ روز اعلان می شوند.
en-mt: Results are usually announced after a few hours or up to 2 days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: تست RT - PCR انجام گرفته با نمونه گیری صرف از گلو صرف در هفته اول مرض قابل اعتماد است.
en-mt: RT-PCR testing performed with mere sampling of the throat is reliable in the first week of the disease.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: در ادامه ممکن است ویروس در گلو ناپدید شود، اگرچه همچنان در شش ها تکثیر می شود.
en-mt: The virus may then disappear in the throat, although it continues to proliferate in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: برای واقعات منتن که در هفته دوم مورد آزمایش قرار گرفتند، مواد نمونه را می توان در بدل، از طرق تنفسی سفلی به وسیله کاتتر مکش یا خارج ساختن بلغم (تقشع) به دست آورد.
en-mt: For the cases of mentone tested in the second week, sample materials can be obtained in exchange for lower respiratory tract by scissor catheter or expulsion of splurge.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: یکی از اولین معینات PCR در جنوری ۲۰۲۰ توسط CharitÃ© در برلین آماده شد که در آن از واکنش زنجیره یی پولیمراز ترانسکرپشن معکوس آنی (rRT-PCR) استفاده شد و پایه لازم برای ساخت ۲۵۰۰۰۰ کیت را فراهم کرد که توسط سازمان جهانی صحت (WHO) توزیع شدند.
en-mt: One of the first PCR appointments was prepared in January 2020 by Charitã© in Berlin, where the instantaneous reverse transcration polymlaser (rRT-PCR) chain reaction was used and provided the basis for the construction of 250,000 kits distributed by the World Health Organization (WHO).

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: بریتانیه هم الی ۲۳ جنوری ۲۰۲۰ یک تست ساخته است. شرکت Kogenebiotech در کوریای جنوبی هم در ۲۸ جنوری ۲۰۲۰ یک کیت شناسایی SARS-CoV-2 درجه کلینیکی، بر پایه PCR به اسم PowerChek Coronavirus تولید کرد.
en-mt: Britain has also made a test until January 23, 2020. On January 28, 2020, Kogenebiotech in South Korea also produced a pcr-based SARS-CoV-2 clinical identification kit called PowerChek Coronavirus.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: جن "E" که در تمام انواع کروناویروس بتا موجود است و جن RdRp که فقط در SARS-CoV-2 وجود دارد را ردیابی می کند. در چین، BGI Group اولین شرکتی بود که برای یک کیت شناسایی پایه PCR غرض شناسایی SARS-CoV-2 تأییدیه استفاده ایمرجنسی را از سازمان ملی محصولات طبی چین دریافت کرد. در ایالات متحده، مراکز کنترول و وقایه امراض (CDC) ایالات متحده پانل تشخیص Real-Time RT-PCR مرض کروناویروس جدید ۲۰۱۹ (2019-nCoV) خود را ذریعه International Reagent Resource در اختیار لابراتوار های عمومی صحی قرار می دهد.
en-mt: It tracks the "E" genie, which is available in all types of beta coronavirus, and the RdRp jen, which only exists in SARS-CoV-2. In China, BGI Group was the first company to receive emergency use approval from china's National Medical Products Organization for a PCR base identification kit to identify SARS-CoV-2. In the United States, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) provides its new 2019 (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR diagnosis panel to public health laboratories through International Emergency Resources.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: یکی از سه تست جنتیک در نسخه های قدیمی کیت های آزمایشی به دلیل وجود نقص در شناساگر، ناتمام ماند و سبب شد آزمایشات در CDC آتلانتا با مشکل مواجه شوند؛ این موضوع سبب شد شمار نمونه هایی که به صورت موفق مورد ارزیابی قرار گرفتند در کل فبروری ۲۰۲۰ طرز متوسط یومیه ۱۰۰ مورد کاهش پیدا کند.
en-mt: One of the three genteel tests in the old versions of the test kits was unfinished due to defects in the identification, causing the tests at the CDC in Atlanta to be difficult, causing the number of samples successfully evaluated to decrease by 100 in the whole of February 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: قابلیت یقین آزمایش هایی که از دو جزء استفاده می کنند تا ۲۸ فبروری ۲۰۲۰ مشخص نشد و لابراتوار های ایالتی و محلی از این تاریخ اجازه شروع آزمایشات را پیدا کردند.
en-mt: The certainty of tests using two components was not determined until February 28, 2020, and state and local laboratories were allowed to start tests from this date.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: این آزمایش توسط اداره غذا و دوا تحت مجوز استفاده ایمرجنسی تأیید شد. لابراتوارهای تجارتی آمریکا آزمایش آن را در اوایل مارچ ۲۰۲۰ آغاز کردند.
en-mt: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under the Emergency Use License. U.S. trade laboratories began testing it in early March 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: تا ۵ مارچ ۲۰۲۰ LabCorp اعلان کرد تست های کووید-۱۹ بر پایه RT-PCR در تمام کشور در دسترس قرار دارند.
en-mt: By March 5, 2020, LabCorp announced that RT-PCR-based COVID-19 tests were available throughout the country.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Quest Diagnostics به همین ترتیب بسته های تست کووید-۱۹ را از تاریخ ۹ مارچ ۲۰۲۰ در سراسر کشور در دسترس قرار داد.
en-mt: Quest Diagnostes similarly made COVID-19 test packages available nationwide from March 9, 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: کدام محدودیت قرنطینی اعلان نشد؛ جمع آوری نمونه و تحلیل آن باید بر اساس الزامات CDC انجام شود.
en-mt: No quarantine restrictions were announced; sample collection and analysis must be carried out according to CDC requirements.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: در روسیه تست کووید-۱۹ توسط مرکز تحقیقات دولتی ویروس شناسی و بیوتکنالوجی طراحی و تولید شد.
en-mt: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was designed and produced by the State Research Center for Virology and Biotechnology.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: در روز ۱۱ فبروری ۲۰۲۰ این آزمایش توسط سازمان فدرال نظارت بر حفظ الصحه و تداوی راجستر شد. در ۱۲ مارچ ۲۰۲۰، گزارش شد شرکت Mayo Clinic برای شناسایی مصابیت به کووید-۱۹ یک تست تولید کرده است. در ۱۳ مارچ ۲۰۲۰، شرکت Roche Diagnostics تأییدیه سازمان غذا و دوا را برای یک تست دریافت کرد که می توان آن را در ۳.۵ ساعت و در حجم زیاد انجام داد، نتیجتاً یک ماشین می توانست در هر ۲۴ ساعت حدود ۴۱۲۸ آزمایش انجام دهد.
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, the test was registered by the Federal Organization for Hygiene and Treatment Monitoring. On March 12, 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have produced a test to identify covid-19 infections. On March 13, 2020, Roche Diagnostics received food and drug organization approval for a test, which can be performed in 3.5 hours and in large volumes, resulting in a machine conducting about 4,128 tests every 24 hours.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: در روز ۱۹ مارچ ۲۰۲۰ سازمان غذا و دوا به خاطر آزمایش های سیستم Abbott's m2000 برای Abbott Laboratories یک مجوز استفاده ایمرجنسی (EUA) صادر کرد؛ سازمان غذا و دوا پیش از این یک مجوز مشابه برای شرکت های Hologic‏، LabCorp و Thermo Fisher Scientific صادر کرده بود.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the Food and Drug Authority issued an emergency use license (EUA) for tests of Abbott's m2000 system for Abbott Laboratories;

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: در روز ۲۱ مارچ ۲۰۲۰ شرکت Cepheid هم از سازمان غذا و دوا برای آزمایشی که ۴۵ دقیقه به طول می انجامد، EUA دریافت کرد.
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Cepheid also received eua from the Food and Drug Organization for an experiment lasting 45 minutes.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: سازمان غذا و دوا آزمایشی را که به جای PCR از تکنالوجی تقویت نوکلئیک اسید ایزوترمال استفاده می کند، تأیید کرده است.
en-mt: The Food and Drug Authority has approved an experiment that uses isothermal acid nucleic acid enhancement technology instead of PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: با در نظر گرفتن آنکه این کار به یک مجموعه چرخه دمای تناوبی نیاز ندارد، این روش می تواند فقط ظرف ۵ دقیقه نتیجه مثبت و در ۱۳ دقیقه نتیجه منفی را مشخص کند.
en-mt: Considering that this does not require a set of periodic temperature cycles, this method can determine a positive result in only 5 minutes and a negative result in 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: در حال حاضر ۱۸۰۰۰ مورد از این ماشین ها در ایالات متحده وجود دارد و Abbott در نظر دارد با افزایش تولید به زودی یومیه ۵۰۰۰۰ تست در روز تولید کند. در حال حاضر در تایوان آزمایشی در حال ساخت است که از انتی بادی مونوکلونال، ماده ای که طرز ویژه پروتین نوکلئوکپسید (پروتین N) کروناویروس های جدید را پیوند می دهد، استفاده می کند؛ امید می رود این نوع آزمایش بتواند مثل یک آزمایش سریع انفلوانزا نتایج را ظرف ۱۵ تا ۲۰ دقیقه ارائه کند.
en-mt: There are currently 18,000 of these machines in the United States, and Abbott plans to produce 50,000 tests a day as production increases soon. Currently, an experiment is under way in Taiwan that uses monoclonal antibodies, a substance that links new coronaviruses in a special way of nucleocapsid protein (Protein N), and it is hoped that this type of test will be able to deliver results within 15 to 20 minutes like a rapid influenza test.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: الی مارچ ۲۰۲۰ از بررسی سوابق می شد به این نتیجه رسید که "رادیوگرافی قفس صدر برای تشخیص مرض در مراحل ابتدایی مرض ارزش کمی دارد در حالی که یافته های CT حتی ممکن است پیش از بروز علائم هم وجود داشته باشند."
en-mt: By March 2020, the records review concluded that "sadr cage radiography is of little value for diagnosing the disease in the early stages of the disease, while CT findings may even exist before symptoms occur."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: بشمول از ویژگی های معمول CT می توان به کدورت های شیشه مات چندوجهی دوطرفه با یک توزیع جانبی، غیرمتقارن و خلفی (پوستریور) اشاره کرد.
en-mt: Including common CT features, two-way multihedral opaque glass turbidity with a lateral, asymmetric and posterior distribution (posterior) can be mentioned.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: تسلط زیر پرده جنب (Subpleural dominance )، با تکامل مرض، نفوذ و الگوهای نامتعارفی (crazy paving) اتفاق می افتد.
en-mt: Subpleural dominance occurs with disease development, penetration and unconventional patterns of clive paving.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: یک مطالعه در ووهان، محل آغاز پاندمی روان، PCR و CT را با یکدیگر مقایسه و اعلان کرد CT در مقایسه با PCR به شکل قابل توجهی حساس تر می باشد، اگرچه کم تر تخصصی است و بسیاری از ویژگی های تصویربرداری آن با سایر امراض سینه و بغل (pneumonia) و مشکلات تنفسی همپوشانی دارد.
en-mt: A study in Wuhan compared the onset of psychedelic pandemic, PCR and CT and announced that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, although it is less specialized and many of its imaging characteristics overlance with other pneumonia and respiratory problems.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: الی مارچ ۲۰۲۰، توصیه پوهنحی رادیولوژی آمریکا این بوده است که "نباید از CT برای سکریننگ مرض بحیث اولین خط آزمایش غرض تشخیص کووید-۱۹ استفاده کرد". الی مارچ ۲۰۲۰، توصیه CDC این بوده است که از PCR برای سکریننگ استفاده شود.
en-mt: By March 2020, the Recommendation of the American Radiology Faculty was that "CT should not be used for screening as the first test line for covid-19 diagnosis". By March 2020, the CDC's recommendation was to use PCR for screening.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: بخشی از پاسخ سیستم مدافه به مرض، تولید انتی بادی هایی از قبیل IgM و IgG است.
en-mt: Part of the response of the system to disease is the production of antibodies such as IgM and IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: این موارد را می توان برای شناسایی مرض در افراد، در فاصله ۷ روز یا بیشتر پس از آغاز علائم، برای مشخص کردن معافیت بدن و برای سرویلانس جمعیتی استفاده کرد. معاینات را می توان در لابراتوار های مرکزی (CLT) یا ذریعه آزمایش نقطه مراقبت (PoCT) انجام داد.
en-mt: These can be used to identify the disease in individuals, within 7 days or more after the onset of symptoms, to determine the exemption of the body and for population cervialness. Examinations can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or through point of care (PoCT) testing.

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: سیستم های خودکار با توان بلند در بسیاری از لابراتوار ها قادر به انجام این ارزیابی ها خواهند بود، اما دسترسی به آنها به نسبت تولید برای هر سیستم بستگی دارد.
en-mt: Long-power automated systems in many laboratories will be able to make these assessments, but access to them depends on the production ratio for each system.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: برای CLT معمولاً از یک نمونه تک خون استفاده می شود، با این حال می توان از نمونه های مسلسل برای دنبال کردن پاسخ سیستم مدافه استفاده کرد.
en-mt: For CLT, a single blood sample is usually used, however machine gun samples can be used to follow the response of the madaffe system.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: برای PoCT نمونه گیری از خون معمولاً با سوراخ کردن جلد به دست می آید.
en-mt: For PoCT, blood sampling is usually obtained by piercing the cover.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: بر خلاف روش های PCR نیازی نیست مراحل خارج سازی پیش از سنجش انجام شوند. در روز ۲۶ مارچ ۲۰۲۰، سازمان غذا و دوا ۲۹ شرکتی را که با توجه به الزامات به سازمان اطلاع داده بودند و نتیجتاً می توانستند آزمایش های انتی بادی خود را توزیع کنند، معرفی کرد.
en-mt: Unlike PCR methods, there is no need for pre-measurement excise procedures. On March 26, 2020, the Food and Drug Authority introduced 29 companies that had notified the organization according to the requirements and could as a result distribute their antibody tests.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: از تاریخ ۷ اپریل ۲۰۲۰، فقط یک تست واحد توسط FDA تحت مجوز استفاده ایمرجنسی تأیید شده است. در اواخر ماه مارچ ۲۰۲۰، Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics و Epitope Diagnostics مجوزهای اروپایی را برای کیت های آزمایش خود دریافت کردند؛ این کیت ها می تواند انتی بادی های IgG و IgA علیه ویروس در نمونه های خون تشخیص دهند.
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, only one single test has been approved by the FDA under the Emergency Use License. In late March 2020, Euroimmune Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European licenses for their testing kits; these kits can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: ظرفیت آزمایش گیری چند صد نمونه در ساعت است و بنابراین از ارزیابی PCR معمول برای RNA ویروسی بسیار سریع تر انجام می شود.
en-mt: The testing capacity is several hundred samples per hour and is therefore much faster than the usual PCR assessment for viral RNA.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: انتی بادی ها معمولاً تا ۱۴ روز پس از آغاز انتان قابل شناسایی استند. در ابتدای اپریل، بریتانیه اعلان کرد هیچکدام از کیت های آزمایش انتی بادی خریداری شده به اندازه کافی خوب نبودند.
en-mt: Antibodies are usually identifiable up to 14 days after the onset of the antenna. At the beginning of April, Britain announced that none of the antibody test kits purchased were good enough.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: هانگ کانگ یک برنامه ترتیب داده است که در آن کسانی که مشکوک به مرض استند می توانند در خانه بمانند، "اداره ایمرجنسی یک لوله نمونه به مریض می دهد"، مریض داخل لوله تُف می اندازد، آن را دوباره ارسال و پس از مدتی نتیجه آزمایش را دریافت می کند. سرویس صحت عامه (NHS) در بریتانیه اعلان کرده است که در حال آزمایش روی طرحی است که در آن واقعات مشکوک در خانه مورد آزمایش قرار بگیرد تا خطر انتقال مرض در مسیر عزیمت به شفاخانه یا لزوم ضدعفونی کردن آمبولانس حامل مریض از بین برود. در مراکز خدمات سواره تست کووید-۱۹ برای واقعات مشکوک، یک متخصص خدمات صحی با بکارگیری اقدامات احتیاطی مناسب نمونه گیری می کند.
en-mt: Hong Kong has arranged a program in which those suspected of being infected can stay at home, "The Emergency Department gives the patient a sample tube," throws the patient inside the tube, sends it back and receives the test result after a while. The Public Health Service (NHS) in Britain has announced that it is testing a scheme in which suspicious incidents are tested at home to eliminate the risk of disease transmission on the way to hospital or the need to disinfect an ambulance carrying the patient. In covid-19 ride service centers for suspicious incidents, a health care professional takes appropriate precautions.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: مراکز خدمات سواره (Drive-through centers) به کوریای جنوبی کمک کردند یکی از سریع ترین و فراگیرترین تست گیری در تمام جهان را اجرا کند. در جرمنی اتحادیه ملی داکتران بیمه صحت قانونی در روز ۲ مارچ اعلان کرد ظرفیت لازم برای انجام حدود ۱۲۰۰۰ آزمایش در روز در داخل آمبولانس را دارد و در هفته پیش از آن ۱۰۷۰۰ مورد آزمایش انجام شده بود.
en-mt: Drive-through centers helped South Korea run one of the fastest and most inclusive testing in the world. In Germany, the National Union of Legal Health Insurance Doctors announced on March 2 that it had the capacity to carry out about 12,000 tests a day inside the ambulance and that 10,700 tests had been carried out in the week before.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: وقتی داکتر انجام آزمایش را تجویز کند، بیمه صحت هزینه ها را به عهده می گیرد.
en-mt: When the doctor prescribes the test, health insurance takes on the costs.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: با توجه به گفته های رئیس Robert Koch Institute، جرمنی ظرفیت انجام مجموعاً ۱۶۰۰۰۰ آزمایش در هفته را دارد.
en-mt: According to president Robert Koch Institute, Germany has the capacity to conduct a total of 160,000 tests per week.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: تا ۱۹ مارچ در چند شهر بزرگ خدمات آزمایش به صورت سواره ارائه می شد.
en-mt: Until March 19, testing services were provided in a cavalry manner in several major cities.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: الی ۲۶ مارچ ۲۰۲۰ مجموع شمار آزمایش های انجام شده در جرمنی هم نامشخص بود، چون فقط نتایج مثبت گزارش می شدند.
en-mt: By March 26, 2020, the total number of tests conducted in Germany was also unclear, as only positive results were reported.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: اولین تحقیق لابراتواری نشان داد که تا هفته تقویمی ۱۲/۲۰۲۰ در مجموع حداقل ۴۸۳۲۹۵ نمونه با در نظر گرفتن خود هفته ۱۲/۲۰۲۰ مورد آزمایش قرار گرفتند و نتیجه آزمایش SARS-CoV-2 برای ۳۳۴۹۱ نفر (۶.۹٪) مثبت بود. در اسرائیل محققین شفاخانه تخنیون و رمبام یک روش برای آزمایش نمونه گرفته شده از ۶۴ مریض به صورت همزمان ابداع کردند که در آن همه نمونه ها با هم ترکیب و آزمایش می شد و در صورت مثبت شدن نتیجه، نمونه ها به صورت تک به تک مورد آزمایش قرار می گرفتند. یک لابراتوار تشخیصیه ایمرجنسی به وسعت ۲۰۰۰ متر مربع در ووهان به نام "هو-یان" (چینایی: 火眼، به معنی "چشم آتشین") در روز ۵ فبروری ۲۰۲۰ توسط BGI بازگشایی شد که می توان یومیه در آن ۱۰۰۰۰ نمونه را آزمایش کرد.
en-mt: The first laboratory study showed that by the calendar week of 12/2020, a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested, taking into account the week 12/2020, and the sars-CoV-2 test result was positive for 33,491 (6.9%). In Israel, researchers at Takhnion and Rambam Hospital devised a method to test samples taken from 64 patients simultaneously, in which all samples were combined and tested, and if the result became positive, the samples would be tested one by one. An emergency diagnostic laboratory with an area of 2,000 square meters in Wuhan called "Hu-yan" (Chinese: ?? meaning "fiery eye") was reopened by BGI on February 5, 2020, where 10,000 samples can be tested.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: بنیان گذار BGI، وانگ جیان، شخصاً روی این پروژه که ۵ روز به طول انجامید، نظارت داشت؛ در مودل سازی ها مشخص شد اگر این ظرفیت اضافه نشده بود واقعات منتن در هوبئی ۴۷٪ بیشتر بود و هزینه اجرای قرنطین دو برابر می شد.
en-mt: The founder of BGI, Wang Jian, personally oversaw the project, which lasted five days; in the modeling, it was determined that if this capacity had not been added, menton incidents in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the cost of quarantine implementation would have doubled.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: پس از لابراتوار ووهان به سرعت لابراتوار هو-یان در شن زن، تیانجین، پکن و شانگهای، در مجموع ۱۲ شهر در سراسر چین، راه اندازی شدند.
en-mt: After wuhan laboratory, hu-yan laboratories were quickly launched in Shenzen, Tianjin, Beijing and Shanghai, a total of 12 cities across China.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: الی ۴ مارچ ۲۰۲۰ مجموع خروجی یومیه بالغ بر ۵۰۰۰۰ تست بوده است. دیزاین های منبع باز و مرکب تهیه شده به وسیله Origami Assays، منتشر شده اند و می توان با استعمال آنها نمونه های بالغ بر ۱۱۲۲ نفر را برای مرض کووید-۱۹، با استعمال صرف ۹۳ آزمایش تست کرد. این دیزاین های متوازن را می توان در لابراتوارهای کوچک بدون ضرورت به اسباب‌های روباتیک کار با مایع اجرا کرد.
en-mt: As of March 4, 2020, the total output of Yumayeh was over 50,000 tests. Open source and composite designs prepared by Origame Assays have been published and can be used to test samples of more than 1,122 people for COVID-19, using only 93 tests. These balanced designs can be implemented in small laboratories without the need for robotic equipment working with liquid.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: تا ماه مارچ، کمبودها و مقادیر ناکافی شناساگر، یکی از تنگناهای تولید انبوه تست در اتحادیه اروپا، بریتانیه و ایالات متحده بود.
en-mt: By March, shortages and inadequate amounts of identification were one of the bottlenecks of mass production of testing in the EUROPEAN Union, Britain and the United States.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: این امر سبب شد که برخی از محققین به بررسی پروتوکل های آماده سازی نمونه بپردازند که شامل گرم کردن نمونه ها الی دمای ۹۸ درجه سانتی گراد (۲۰۸ درجه فارنهایت) به مدت ۵ دقیقه برای آزاد شدن جینوم های RNA برای آزمایش های بعدی است. در ۳۱ مارچ اعلان شد که امارات متحده عربی در آن زمان به نسبت نفوس خود، بیش از هر کشور دیگری باشندگان را در مقابل کروناویروس آزمایش کرده است و در مسیر رسیدن به سطح آزمایش کل نفوس خود است.
en-mt: This led some researchers to examine sample preparation protocols, including heating samples to 98°C (208°F) for 5 minutes to release RNA ginoms for subsequent experiments. On March 31, it was announced that the United Arab Emirates had tested more residents against coronavirus than any other country at the time, and was on track to reach its total population testing level.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: این کار با ترکیب امکان ارائه خدمات سواره و خرید یک لابراتوار نمونه انبوه مقیاس جمعیتی از Group 42 و BGI (بر اساس لابراتوار های شناسایی ایمرجنسی "هو-یان" در چین) انجام شد.
en-mt: This was done by combining the possibility of providing ride-based services and purchasing a mass population scale laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on "Hu-yan" emergency identification laboratories in China).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: این لابراتوار که در مدت ۱۴ روز ساخته شد، قادر است یومیه ده ها هزار آزمایش RT-PCR را انجام دهد و اولین نمونه در این مقیاس است که در خارج از چین عملیاتی شده است.
en-mt: Built within 14 days, the laboratory is capable of conducting tens of thousands of RT-PCR tests and is the first sample on this scale to be operational outside China.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: طرزالعمل های تست مختلفی که قسمت های مختلف پروفایل جنتیکی کروناویروس را مورد هدف قرار می دهند، در چین، فرانسه، جرمنی، هانگ کانگ، جاپان و ایالات متحده توسعه داده شده است.
en-mt: Various testing procedures targeting different parts of coronavirus's genteel profile have been developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: سازمان جهانی صحت برای تولید کیت های ارسالی به کشورهای کم درآمد که از منابع کافی برای ساخت کیت برخوردار نیستند، از دستورالعمل جرمنی ها بهره گرفت.
en-mt: The World Health Organization used German guidelines to produce kits sent to low-income countries that do not have enough resources to make kits.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: دستورالعمل جرمنی در ۱۷ جنوری ۲۰۲۰ منتشر شد؛ پروتوکول مرکز کنترول مرض ایالات متحده تا ۲۸ جنوری در دسترس نبود و آزمایشات در دسترس در ایالات متحده را به تأخیر انداخت. چین و ایالات متحده مشکلاتی درمورد قابلیت اعتماد کیت های تست در اوایل این شیوع داشتند و این کشورها و استرالیا قادر به تأمین کیت های کافی برای پوره ساختن تقاضاها و توصیه های کارشناسان صحت برای انجام آزمایش نبودند.
en-mt: The German directive was released on January 17, 2020; the U.S. Disease Control Center protocol was not available until January 28, delaying tests available in the United States. China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to provide enough kits to meet the demands and recommendations of health experts for testing.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: از سوی دیگر، متخصصان اظهار دارند دسترسی گسترده به تست در کوریای جنوبی به کاهش شیوع کروناویروس های جدید کمک کرده است.
en-mt: On the other hand, experts say widespread access to testing in South Korea has helped reduce the prevalence of new coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: ظرفیت آزمایش گیری، عمدتاً به شکل لابراتوار های بخش خصوصی، در طول چند سال توسط دولت کوریای جنوبی ایجاد شد.
en-mt: Testing capacity, mainly in the form of private sector laboratories, was established over several years by the South Korean government.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: در ۱۶ مارچ، سازمان جهانی صحت اعلان کرد پروگرام های گرفتن آزمایش بحیث بهترین روش در کاهش سرعت پیشرفت پاندمی کووید-۱۹ باید تسریع شوند. تقاضای بالا برای آزمایش به دلیل شیوع گسترده ویروس سبب شده بود صدها هزار آزمایش در لابراتوار های خصوصی ایالات متحده انباشته شود و عرضه لوازم نمونه گیری و مواد کیمیاوی به سختی صورت گیرد.
en-mt: On March 16, the World Health Organization announced that testing programs should be accelerated as the best way to slow down the progress of the COVID-19 pandemic. High demand for testing due to the widespread outbreak of the virus had caused hundreds of thousands of tests to accumulate in private U.S. laboratories, making it difficult to supply sampling supplies and chemicals.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: در مارچ ۲۰۲۰ چین گزارش کرد کیت های آزمایشی تولیدی این کشور مشکل دارند و دقیق نیستند.
en-mt: In March 2020, China reported that the country's experimental kits were problematic and not accurate.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: در ایالات متحده، کیت های آزمایش ساخته شده توسط CDC "نقص" داشتند؛ پس از آن دولت موانع اداری که جلوی آزمایش های خصوصی را گرفته بود، حذف کرد. اسپانیا کیت های آزمایش را از یک شرکت چینایی به نام Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd خریداری کرد اما متوجه شد نتایج نادرست بودند.
en-mt: In the United States, test kits made by the CDC had "defects"; the government then removed administrative barriers that had prevented private tests. Spain bought the testing kits from a Chinese company called Shenshen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd but found the results were incorrect.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: این شرکت توضیح می دهد که نتایج نادرست ممکن است نتیجه عدم دریافت نمونه مناسب یا استفاده نادرست از کیت آزمایشی باشند.
en-mt: The company explains that incorrect results may be the result of not receiving the right sample or improper use of the test kit.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: وزارت دفاع اسپانیا اعلان کرد که کیت های حاوی نتایج نادرست را جمع آوری خواهد کرد و آنها را با یک کیت آزمایش متفاوت ارائه شده از طرف Shenzhen Bioeasy تبدیل خواهد کرد. ۸۰ فیصد از کیت های آزمایشی که جمهوری چک از چین خریداری کرده است نتایج اشتباه دادند. اسلوواکی ۱.۲ ملیون کیت تست از چین خریداری کرده که مشخص شد دقیق نبوده اند.
en-mt: Spain's Defense Ministry announced it would collect kits containing incorrect results and replace them with a different testing kit provided on behalf of Shenshen Bioeasy. 80% of the test kits purchased by the Czech Republic from China gave the wrong results. Slovakia has purchased 1.2 million test kits from China, which it found were not accurate.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: نخست وزیر ماتوویچ پیشنهاد کرد به داخل دریای دانوب ریخته شوند. آتش کارا، یکی از اعضای وزارت صحت ترکیه، گفت کیت های آزمایشی که ترکیه از چین خریداری کرده "نسبت خطای بالا" دارند و "از آنها استفاده نشده" است. بریتانیه ۳.۵ ملیون کیت از چین خریداری کرد اما در ابتدای اپریل ۲۰۲۰ اعلان شد این کیت ها غیرقابل استفاده استند.
en-mt: Prime Minister Matovich suggested they be dumped into the Danube Sea. Atash Kara, a member of turkey's health ministry, said the test kits Turkey bought from China had a "high error ratio" and were "unused." Britain bought 3.5 million kits from China, but at the beginning of April 2020 it was announced that the kits were unusable.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: آزمایش گیری به همراه قرنطین افرادی که نتیجه مثبت داشتند و ردیابی افرادی که با اشخاص مصاب SARS-CoV-2 تماس داشته اند، منجر به دستاوردهای مثبت شد.
en-mt: Testing along with quarantine of people with positive results and tracking of people who had contact with SARS-CoV-2 infected people led to positive achievements.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: محققانی که در شهر ایتالیایی وُ ‎(Vo')‎، محل ثبت اولین مورد مرگ میر کووید-۱۹ در ایتالیا، کار می کردند دو مرحله آزمایش را روی تمام ۳۴۰۰ تن باشنده شهر، با فاصله حدوداً ده روز، انجام دادند.
en-mt: Researchers working in the Italian city of Vo', the site of the first covid-19 death in Italy, conducted two phases of testing on all 3,400 residents of the city, with a distance of about ten days.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: حدود نیمی از افراد با نتیجه مثبت کدام علامتی نداشتند و همه واقعات کشف شده قرنطین شدند.
en-mt: About half of the people with positive results had no symptoms and all the discovered incidents were quarantined.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: با محدود کردن مسافرت های شهری، واقعات منتن جدید طرز مکمل از بین رفتند.
en-mt: By limiting urban travel, the new mentone events were destroyed.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: پاندمی کروناویروس در سال ۲۰۲۰ در سینگاپور به دلیل ردگیری شدید تماس، محدودیت های مسافرت داخلی، انجام آزمایش و قرنطین بسیار آهسته تر از سایر کشورهای توسعه یافته شیوع پیدا کرده است، اما کدام محدودیت شدیدی از قبیل رخصتی اجباری رستورانت ها و مراکز خرده فروشی اعمال نشد.
en-mt: The coronavirus pandemic has spread much slower in Singapore in 2020 due to severe contact tracking, domestic travel restrictions, testing and quarantine than in other developed countries, but no severe restrictions, such as mandatory holidays for restaurants and retail centers, were imposed.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: بسیاری از رویدادها لغو شدند و سینگاپور به شهروندانش توصیه کرده ۲۸ مارچ در خانه بمانند، اما مکاتب پس از رخصتی، دوباره در ۲۳ مارچ بازگشایی شدند.
en-mt: Many events were cancelled and Singhapur has advised its citizens to stay home March 28, but schools reopened on March 23 after the holidays.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: چند کشور دیگر مانند ایسلند و کوریای جنوبی هم با برنامه های سخت گیرانه ردگیری تماس، محدودیت های سفر داخلی، انجام آزمایش و قرنطین کردن این پاندمی را مدیریت کردند، اما رخصتی سخت گیرانه کم تری داشتند.
en-mt: Several other countries, such as Iceland and South Korea, also managed strict contact tracking programs, domestic travel restrictions, testing and quarantine of the pandemic, but had less strict holidays.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: یک مطالعه آماری نشان داد کشورهایی که نسبت به آمار فوت، آزمایش های تشخیص بیشتری انجام دادند، میزان موارد مرگ بسیار کم تری دارند، احتمالاً به این دلیل که این کشورها بهتر می توانند واقعات منتنیی را که فقط علائم خفیف دارند یا کدام علامتی ندارند، شناسایی کنند.
en-mt: A statistical study showed that countries that conducted more diagnostic tests than death statistics have much lower death rates, possibly because these countries can better identify mentoring events that have only mild symptoms or which symptoms they have.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
